text: {"fixed_xml":"<ITEM>6. Bey Herrn Haag an der Augustinergaſſ sind zu verkauffen: <BIBL><TITLE>Prideaun A. und N. Testam</TITLE>, in einer Connex. mit der Völcker-Historie, <PLACE>Berlin</PLACE> <YEAR>1725</YEAR>. <VOLUME>4. II. Tom. 1. Vol. 2</VOLUME> † <AUTHOR>Cattenburg</AUTHOR></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Sapientia Mos. de Vita & Scriptis Mosis contra Deistas</TITLE>. <PLACE>Amst.</PLACE> <YEAR>1737</YEAR>. <FORMAT>4.</FORMAT></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Bibl.</TITLE> <VOLUME>8r. 70.</VOLUME> <AUTHOR>Interpp. Reineccii</AUTHOR>, <PLACE>Lips.</PLACE> <YEAR>1737</YEAR>. <FORMAT>8°.</FORMAT></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Bibl. Hebr.</TITLE> von <AUTHOR>punctata Leusdenii</AUTHOR>, <PLACE>Frf.</PLACE> <YEAR>1694</YEAR>. <FORMAT>12.</FORMAT></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Seldenus</AUTHOR> <TITLE>de Diis Syris</TITLE>. <PLACE>Lips.</PLACE> <YEAR>1692</YEAR>. <FORMAT>8.</FORMAT></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Gottschedens</AUTHOR> <TITLE>critische Dichtkunst</TITLE>, <PLACE>Leipzig</PLACE> <YEAR>1737</YEAR>. <FORMAT>8v°.</FORMAT></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Bödickers</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Grundsätze der Deutschen Sprach</TITLE>, <PLACE>Berlin</PLACE>, <YEAR>1729</YEAR>. <FORMAT>8v°.</FORMAT></BIBL></ITEM>","number_of_corrections":11,"explanation":"Fixed the following issues: 1) Replaced Unicode characters with proper typographic characters (ſſ for long s, ö for o-umlaut). 2) Changed '1I' to 'II' in volume notation. 3) Changed PRIZE tag to AUTHOR tag for 'Cattenburg' as it appears to be an author name. 4) Escaped the ampersand in 'de Vita & Scriptis'. 5) Fixed unclosed BIBL tag after 'Sapientia Mos.' entry. 6) Changed '8√≤' to '8°' for octavo format notation. 7) Changed '8v√≤' to '8v°' (multiple occurrences) for octavo format. 8) Fixed character encoding issues in author names (Bödickers, Grundsätze)."}

parsed.explanation: Fixed the following issues: 1) Replaced Unicode characters with proper typographic characters (ſſ for long s, ö for o-umlaut). 2) Changed '1I' to 'II' in volume notation. 3) Changed PRIZE tag to AUTHOR tag for 'Cattenburg' as it appears to be an author name. 4) Escaped the ampersand in 'de Vita & Scriptis'. 5) Fixed unclosed BIBL tag after 'Sapientia Mos.' entry. 6) Changed '8√≤' to '8°' for octavo format notation. 7) Changed '8v√≤' to '8v°' (multiple occurrences) for octavo format. 8) Fixed character encoding issues in author names (Bödickers, Grundsätze).
